avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules

Class NodeRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.NodeRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeDataRule, NodeFileRule, NodeTypeRule

    public abstract class NodeRule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is an abstract rule used for visualization purposes. The NodeRule works as follows: for each Node, MapViewer will scan through a list of NodeRules until it finds a rule that matches (see matches(avdta.network.node.Node, int)). Each Node is displayed as a filled circle. The radius is specified by getRadius(avdta.network.node.Node, int). The border color is specified by getColor(avdta.network.node.Node, int), and the fill color is specified by getBackColor(avdta.network.node.Node, int).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
